text: Is there an effort atm to include likelihood-free/simulation based inference in Turing (or elsewhere?)

elements.text: Is there an effort atm to include likelihood-free/simulation based inference in Turing (or elsewhere?)

text: Nothing yet, as far as I'm aware.

elements.text: Nothing yet, as far as I'm aware.

text: Is there much interest in a library for likelihood free inference? I'm really interested in it (writing a grant application for an ABC postdoc at the moment) and noticed that the Julia ecosystem for ABC is a bit fragmented. I'd be happy to put in time towards this.
